title: The Fascinating Afterlives of Defunct Pizza Hut Buildings
text:
The Fascinating Afterlives of Defunct Pizza Hut Buildings 
Published By: Wired.com - Today 
There was a time when Pizza Huts had tablecloths, cold beer, and distinctive red roofs. Those restaurants are largely gone, but the building...
